Write notes, plans, game plays direectly on the cover, then erase and start again. A second, lower compartment is deep enough to hold additional work orders, forms, art supplies, markers, tablets, and writing supplies. Two latches keep compartments closed tightly, protecting contents from the wind and rain while working outdoors. Each compartment opens separately, to keep conents organized and protected from the elements. Proudly made by Dexas: a Texas-based designer and manufacturer of innovative office, kitchenware and pet products. The Clearview is a patented product: Patent No. D896,308, US and Foreign Patents Pending.
